jobDescription: OverviewCrimson Hexagon helps global brands better understand their consumers. With instant access to the world’s largest volume of unstructured text and images across social, online public, and enterprise-held data sources, Crimson Hexagon’s AI-powered consumer insights platform allows clients to analyze audiences, track brand perception and campaign performance, and even detect competitive and market trends. Our clients include Anheuser-Busch InBev, Adidas, General Mills, Paramount Pictures, and Twitter. We’re a high growth software company headquartered in Boston with offices in Chicago, New York, San Francisco and London. Find us on Twitter and on LinkedIn.  We are seeking an Onboarding Consultant to work closely with our customers to help with product adoption and onboarding. The ideal candidate will have prior experience managing customer expectations and helping them succeed. We are seeking an excellent problem-solver with proven analytical skills.
